title.rendered: STEDI SHOCK 6 MINING SPEC LED FLOOD LIGHT

content.rendered:
The ST12240-60W is over-engineered to withstand the 24/7 punishment that is the modus operandi when it comes to mining and heavy machine applications.

*Outer surround not included*

MINE SPEC ULTRA-WIDE BEAM

BUILT TOUGH!

TORTURE PROOF

We know the maintenance bosses are getting frustrated with the current so called “Mine spec” lighting on the market. $500+ for a similar offering with dismall realworld lifespan of 500 hours is simply unacceptable. We’ve worked closely with Australia’s leading mining entities, and listened carefully to the concerns and strict requirements of the industry’s most experienced maintenance chiefs, to design a task light to rule them all.

DESIGNED FOR HIGHLY ADVERSE ENVIRONMENTS

Day or night, we know your operators will never turn these off, which is why we have designed in a circuit that will momentarily limit current if temperatures exceed a prescribed parameters. We know that voltage spikes are common place, which why we have built in over and under voltage protection. Communication & GPS must be open at all times, no problem our lights are built to eliminate RFI and EMI pollution. 5mm thick 3 series stainless steel brackets with suspended shock dampening means that we insist that these are used on your most brutal machine.

TURN THE SUN BACK ON

A carefully engineered reflector systems distributes 5,400Lm of light volume in a very homogeneous and ultra wide beam.  We’ve spent the time ray-tracing so your operators can focus on the job. Get in touch with our team to discover how we’ve saved Australia’s largest mining companies over $200k on their lighting projects.

DETAILS

PROTECTED AGAINST;

  • Reverse polarity
  • Shock proof,waterproof and UV shielded
  • RFI/EMC interference | Wont interfere with existing electronic systems.
  • Voltage and current surge

FEATURES 

  • Dynamic Thermal management regulator | Designed to operated 24 hours a day 7 days per week.
  • Die Cast aluminium ADC12 heat-sink
  • Silicon Power Cable
  • Anodized Powder coat | Abrasion resistant
  • Lexan Poly-carbonate Front Cover | Unbreakable
  • Environmentally sealed Deutsch DT04-2 connectors
  • Vibration and shock absorbing bracketing.  .

SPECIFICATIONS

POWER 60 Watts
LED 6 x 10w CREE XM-L2
CURRENT DRAW 5.3A @ 12v, 2.3A @ 24v
VOLTAGE 9 to 36v
LUMEN 5,400LM
INGRESS PROTECTION IP68
CCT 6000K
LIFESPAN 50,000 hrs LM-80
LENS LEXAN Optical PC
WEIGHT 2.070kg
BEAM 60° Flood
PEAK BEAM DISTANCE @ 1 LUX 132m
CERTIFICATES CE, IP68
CONNECTOR Deutsch DT04-2P

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 60W Mining Spec Flood Light
  • Stainless Steel U Bracket
  • Secondary Shock Dampening Mount
  • Mounting Pad
  • Stainlesss  Steel Fasteners

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI SHOCK 6 MINING SPEC LED FLOOD LIGHT

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
